title: How to Make Guava Barbecue Sauce

steps.headline: Add all of the ingredients except for the salt/pepper in a saucepan.
Cook the mixture on a medium high heat.
steps.description: Allow it to simmer and use a wire whisk to stir it constantly.

steps.headline: Season the sauce with salt and pepper.
Lower the heat to a medium low temperature and continue simmering for an additional 10 to 15 minutes.
steps.description: Allow the sauce to thicken to a "pourable" state.

steps.headline: Serve the sauce immediately.
steps.description: You can also chill in the refrigerator for later use.

text: Add all of the ingredients except for the salt/pepper in a saucepan.  Cook the mixture on a medium high heat. Allow it to simmer and use a wire whisk to stir it constantly. Season the sauce with salt and pepper.  Lower the heat to a medium low temperature and continue simmering for an additional 10 to 15 minutes. Allow the sauce to thicken to a "pourable" state. Serve the sauce immediately. You can also chill in the refrigerator for later use.
